item.title: Pavement pothole outside 43 Pilley Crescent, 10th July
item.description:
Outside 43 Pilley Crescent Leckhampton Cheltenham Glos GL53 9ES - this was reported several years ago but to no avail. The first photo shows the pothole in 2020 the second photo(with the truck in it) shows it in July 2025 where it has worsened ie the 2 potholes have joined up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Qquery re removal of tree behind 28 stanwick gardens GL51 9LF, 10th July
item.description:
I understand from a neighbour the tree was diseased hence it's removal recently Jult 2025, can I ask if there are plans to replace it please? If so can I ask if it is to be similar tree to that which was removed? I am happy to contribute to a replacement if it can be more than
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Stanwick Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover damage, 10th July
item.description:
The drainage cover has once again sunk deeper into the road leaving a deep dip, in which heavy vehicles “thump” into, causing hard vibrations to be felt within the adjacent houses. It’s demise also restricts water flow into the drain during heavy rain. The drain location is opposite the entrance to Oakland Drive as per photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 171, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signpost damage in accident, 10th July
item.description:
West side of A435 at Oxenton turn. Sign damaged in accident and now only supported on one post. Other post in ditch. Sign could rotate in wind and impede traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Oxenton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
